UPDATE Basis.BIN_CounterPointPlan SET
StartDate = #tartDate#
EndDate = #endDate#
CurrentPointLimit = CurrentPointLimit + #pointChange#
Comment = #comment#
WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationID = #organizationId#

UPDATE Basis.BIN_CounterPointPlanHistory SET ActualEndTime = #entDate#
WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationID = #organizationId# AND StartTime = #startDate# AND ActualEndTime > #entDate#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT A.BIN_CounterInfoID, A.CounterCode, B.StartDate, B.BIN_OrganizationID, B.EndDate, B.CurrentPointLimit, B.Comment, D.EmployeeName AS employeeName, A.CounterNameIF AS counterName FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterPointPlan B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee D WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.BIN_EmployeeID = D.BIN_EmployeeID WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
A.CounterCode like '%'+ #counterCode# +'%'
A.CounterNameIF like '%'+ #counterName# +'%'
B.CurrentPointLimit >= #pointLimitBegin#
B.CurrentPointLimit <= #pointLimitEnd#
(( #pointDateBegin# <= B.StartDate AND #pointDateEnd# > B.StartDate ) OR ( #pointDateBegin# BETWEEN B.StartDate AND B.EndDate ))
( #pointDateBegin# < B.EndDate )
( #pointDateEnd# > B.StartDate )
B.StartDate <= convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) and convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) <= B.EndDate
(B.StartDate > convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) or convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) > B.EndDate or B.StartDate is null)
A.ValidFlag = #counterStatus#
sqlMap.select: SELECT TOP 1 BIN_OrganizationID, StartDate, EndDate, CurrentPointLimit, Comment FROM Basis.BIN_CounterPointPlan WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationID = #organizationId#
